interestingFact: Japan has more than 6,800 islands and the world's oldest monarchy.
The Amazon rainforest in Brazil produces 20% of the world’s oxygen.
Canada has the longest coastline of any country in the world.
Egypt is home to the only remaining wonder of the ancient world — the Great Pyramid of Giza.
India is the birthplace of chess and yoga, and has over 19,500 languages spoken.
Australia is home to more kangaroos than humans.
Italy has more UNESCO World Heritage sites than any other country.
South Korea has the fastest average internet speed in the world.
Norway is powered almost entirely by renewable energy, mainly hydropower.
